T04TD3878E:188a-1: bo dhi satva ts'ar+ya aa ba t'a ra shat+trim shata pandi aartha /
T04TD3878E:188a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i don sum cu rtsa drug bsdus pa /
T04TD3878E:188b-0: sangs rgyas dang byang @188b chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04TD3878E:188b-1: dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' //
T04TD3878E:188b-2: skyes bu don grub thob par gyur pa la //
T04TD3878E:188b-3: gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na //
T04TD3878E:188b-4: phyis 'di yang dag 'byor bar ga la 'gyur //
T04TD3878E:188b-5: ji ltar mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum na //
T04TD3878E:188b-6: glog 'gyu skad cig rab snang ston pa ltar //
T04TD3878E:188b-7: de bzhin sangs rgyas mthu yis brgya lam na //
T04TD3878E:188b-8: 'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung //
T04TD3878E:188b-9: de ltar dge ba nyam chung nyid la rtag / sdig pa stobs chen shin tu mi bzad pa //
T04TD3878E:188b-10: de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa //
T04TD3878E:188b-11: dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis non par 'gyur //
T04TD3878E:188b-12: bskal ba du mar rab dgongs mdzad pa yi //
T04TD3878E:188b-13: thub dbang rnams kyis 'di nyid phan par gzigs //
T04TD3878E:188b-14: 'dis ni tshad med skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyi //
T04TD3878E:188b-15: bde mchog bde blag nyid du thob par byed //
T04TD3878E:188b-16: 'jigs dang sdug bsngal brgya phrag gzhom 'dod cing //
T04TD3878E:188b-17: sems can mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa dang ;
T04TD3878E:188b-18: / bde mang brgya phrag spyod par 'dod pas kyang //
T04TD3878E:188b-19: byang chub sems nyid rtag tu btang mi bya //
T04TD3878E:188b-20: byang chub sems skyes gyur na skad cig gi /'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams //
T04TD3878E:188b-21: bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya zhing //
T04TD3878E:188b-22: 'jig rten lha mir bcas pas phyag byar 'gyur //
T04TD3878E:188b-23: gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa mchog lta bur //
T04TD3878E:188b-24: mi gtsang lus 'di blangs nas rgyal ba'i sku //
T04TD3878E:188b-25: rin chen rin thang med par sgyur bas na //
T04TD3878E:188b-26: byang chub sems zhes bya bar rab brtan bzung //
T04TD3878E:188b-27: byang chub sems de mdor bsdu na //
T04TD3878E:188b-28: rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste //
T04TD3878E:188b-29: byang chub smon pa'i sems dang ni //
T04TD3878E:188b-30: byang chub 'jug pa nyid yin no //
T04TD3878E:188b-32: bye brag ji ltar shes pa ltar //
T04TD3878E:188b-33: de bzhin mkhas pas 'di gnyis kyi //
T04TD3878E:188b-34: bye brag rim bzhin shes par bya //
T04TD3878E:188b-35: byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni //
T04TD3878E:188b-37: ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du //
T04TD3878E:188b-38: bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min //
T04TD3878E:188b-39: gang nas bzung ste sems can khams //
T04TD3878E:188b-40: mtha' yas rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
T04TD3878E:188b-41: mi ldog pa yi sems kyis su //
T04TD3878E:188b-42: sems de yang dag blangs gyur pa //
T04TD3878E:188b-43: de nas bzung ste gnyid log gam //
T04TD3878E:188b-44: bag med gyur kyang bsod nams shugs //
T04TD3878E:189a-0: @189a * // rgyun mi 'chad par du ma zhig / nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'byung //
T04TD3878E:189a-1: phan par bsams pa tsam gyis kyang //
T04TD3878E:189a-2: sangs rgyas mchod las khyad 'phags na //
T04TD3878E:189a-3: sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
T04TD3878E:189a-4: bde don brtson pa smos cing gos //
T04TD3878E:189a-6: sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug / bde ba 'dod kyang gti mug pas //
T04TD3878E:189a-7: rang gi bde ba dgra ltar 'joms //
T04TD3878E:189a-8: gang zhig bde bas phongs pa dang //
T04TD3878E:189a-9: sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag la //
T04TD3878E:189a-10: bde ba kun gyis tshim pa dang //
T04TD3878E:189a-11: sdug bsngal thams cad gcod byed cing //
T04TD3878E:189a-12: gti mug kyang ni sel byed pa //
T04TD3878E:189a-13: de dang dge mtshungs ga la yod //
T04TD3878E:189a-14: de 'dra'i sems kyang ga la yod //
T04TD3878E:189a-15: bsod nams de 'dra 'ang ga la yod //
T04TD3878E:189a-16: gang zhig de 'dra'i rgyas sras sbyin bdag la //
T04TD3878E:189a-17: gal te ngan sems skyed par byed pa de //
T04TD3878E:189a-18: ngan sems bskyed pa'i grangs bzhin bskal par ni //
T04TD3878E:189a-19: dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur zhes thub pas gsungs //
T04TD3878E:189a-20: 'on te gang zhig yid rab dang byed pa //
T04TD3878E:189a-21: de yi 'bras bu de bas lhag par 'phel //
T04TD3878E:189a-22: rgyal sras rnams la do gal chen pos kyang //
T04TD3878E:189a-23: sdig pa mi 'byung dge ba dang gis 'phel //
T04TD3878E:189a-24: rin chen sems de gzung bar bya ba'i phyir //
T04TD3878E:189a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang dam pa'i chos //
T04TD3878E:189a-26: dkon mchog dri ma med dang sangs rgyas sras //
T04TD3878E:189a-27: yon tan rgya mtsho rnams la legs par mchod //
T04TD3878E:189a-28: yon tan rgya mtsho can dag la //
T04TD3878E:189a-29: zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi /
T04TD3878E:189a-30: phyag 'tshal dbyangs kyi yan lag ni //
T04TD3878E:189a-31: phyag 'tshal dbyangs kyi bstod pas bstod //
T04TD3878E:189a-32: byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar ;
T04TD3878E:189a-33: / sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi //
T04TD3878E:189a-34: chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi /
T04TD3878E:189a-35: tshogs la 'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi //
T04TD3878E:189a-36: phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi //
T04TD3878E:189a-37: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems //
T04TD3878E:189a-38: thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la //
T04TD3878E:189a-39: thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni //
T04TD3878E:189a-40: thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas /
T04TD3878E:189a-42: bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa 'am //
T04TD3878E:189a-43: bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang ni //
T04TD3878E:189a-44: gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te //
T04TD3878E:189a-45: rjes su yi rang gang bgyis pa //
T04TD3878E:189a-46: nongs pa de ni mthong bgyis nas //
T04TD3878E:189a-47: bsam pa thag pas mgon la bshags //
T04TD3878E:189b-0: @189b sems can kun gyi ngan song gi / sdug bsngal ngal so'i dge ba dang //
T04TD3878E:189b-1: sdug bsngal can dag bder gnas la //
T04TD3878E:189b-2: dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo //
T04TD3878E:189b-3: phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas la //
T04TD3878E:189b-4: thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni //
T04TD3878E:189b-5: sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la //
T04TD3878E:189b-6: chos kyi sgron me spar du gsol //
T04TD3878E:189b-7: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das bzhed la //
T04TD3878E:189b-8: thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni /
T04TD3878E:189b-10: bskal pa grangs med bzhugs par gsol //
T04TD3878E:189b-11: de ltar 'di dag kun byas te //
T04TD3878E:189b-12: dge ba bdag gis bsags pa gang //
T04TD3878E:189b-13: des ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T04TD3878E:189b-14: sdug bsngal thams cad bsal bar shog / ji ltar sngon gyi bde gshegs kyis //
T04TD3878E:189b-15: byang chub thugs ni bskyed pa dang //
T04TD3878E:189b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la //
T04TD3878E:189b-17: de dag rim bzhin gnas pa ltar //
T04TD3878E:189b-18: de bzhin 'gro la phan don du //
T04TD3878E:189b-19: byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T04TD3878E:189b-20: de bzhin du ni bslab pa la'ang //
T04TD3878E:189b-21: rim pa bzhin du bslab bar bgyi //
T04TD3878E:189b-22: de ltar blo dang ldan pa yis //
T04TD3878E:189b-23: rab dang byang chub sems bzung nas //
T04TD3878E:189b-24: mjug kyang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir //
T04TD3878E:189b-25: sems ni 'di ltar gzengs bstod do //
T04TD3878E:189b-26: de tshe bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T04TD3878E:189b-27: mi yi srid pa legs par thob //
T04TD3878E:189b-28: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T04TD3878E:189b-29: sangs rgyas sras su da gyur to //
T04TD3878E:189b-30: byang chub sems rab brtan bzung nas //
T04TD3878E:189b-31: g-yel ba med par rtag tu yang //
T04TD3878E:189b-33: bab col brtsams pa gang yin pa'am //
T04TD3878E:189b-34: gang zhig legs par rab brtags pa //
T04TD3878E:189b-35: de ni dam bcas byas gyur kyang //
T04TD3878E:189b-36: bya ba 'am gtang zhes brtags par rigs //
T04TD3878E:189b-37: sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras //
T04TD3878E:189b-38: shes rab chen pos gang brtags shing //
T04TD3878E:189b-39: bdag nyid kyis kyang brtags brtags pa //
T04TD3878E:189b-40: de la bshol du ci zhig yod //
T04TD3878E:189b-41: gal te de ltar dam bcas nas //
T04TD3878E:189b-42: las kyis bsgrub par ma byas na //
T04TD3878E:189b-43: sems can de dag kun bsdus na //
T04TD3878E:189b-45: cis rmongs dag kyang ma shes na //
T04TD3878E:189b-46: bdag gi khong na ci zhig yod //
T04TD3878E:189b-47: zhe sdang sred sogs sgra rnams ni //
T04TD3878E:189b-48: rkang lag la sogs yod min yang //
T04TD3878E:189b-49: dpa' mdzangs min yang ci zhig ltar //
T04TD3878E:189b-50: de dag gis bdag bran bzhin byas //
T04TD3878E:189b-51: bslab pa bsrung par 'dod pa yis //
T04TD3878E:190a-2: sems ni bsrung bar ma byas na //
T04TD3878E:190a-3: bslab pa bsrung bar yong mi nus //
T04TD3878E:190a-4: sems bsrung 'dod pa rnams la ni //
T04TD3878E:190a-5: dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dag / srog la bab kyang srungs shig ces //
T04TD3878E:190a-6: bdag ni de skad 'doms par byed //
T04TD3878E:190a-7: bla ma dang ne 'grogs pa dang //
T04TD3878E:190a-8: mkhan pos rjes su bstan pa las /
T04TD3878E:190a-9: 'jigs pas skal ldan gus byed la //
T04TD3878E:190a-10: dran pa shin tu skye bar 'gyur //
T04TD3878E:190a-11: rtag par dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni //
T04TD3878E:190a-12: theg chen don la mkhas pa dang //
T04TD3878E:190a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs mchog / srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ba'o ;
T04TD3878E:190a-14: /'di dang sangs rgyas bka' stsal gzhan //
T04TD3878E:190a-15: mod sde bklags nas shes par bya //
T04TD3878E:190a-16: mod sde rnams las bslab pa snang //
T04TD3878E:190a-17: de bas mdo sde bklag par bya //
T04TD3878E:190a-18: bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi //
T04TD3878E:190a-19: sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs //
T04TD3878E:190a-20: legs spyad gang yin de kun yang //
T04TD3878E:190a-21: khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed //
T04TD3878E:190a-22: zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig pa med //
T04TD3878E:190a-23: bzod pa lta bu'i dka' thub med //
T04TD3878E:190a-24: de bas bzod la nan tan du //
T04TD3878E:190a-25: sna tshogs tshul gyis bsgom par bya //
T04TD3878E:190a-26: bdag gam bdag gis bshes rnams la //
T04TD3878E:190a-27: sdug bsngal brnyas dang tshig rtsub dang //
T04TD3878E:190a-29: dgra la de las bzlog pa 'byung //
T04TD3878E:190a-31: sdug bsngal rgyu ni shin tu mang //
T04TD3878E:190a-32: sdug bsngal med par nges 'byung med //
T04TD3878E:190a-33: de bas sems khyod brtan par gnos [?] //
T04TD3878E:190a-34: mkhris pa la sogs sdug bsngal gyi //
T04TD3878E:190a-35: 'byung gnas che la mi khro na //
T04TD3878E:190a-36: sems yod rnams la ci ste khro //
T04TD3878E:190a-37: de dag kun kyang rkyen gyis bskul //
T04TD3878E:190a-38: nyes pa ji snyed thams cad dang //
T04TD3878E:190a-39: sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T04TD3878E:190a-40: de kun rkyen gyi stobs las byung //
T04TD3878E:190a-41: rang dbang yod pa ma yin no //
T04TD3878E:190a-42: de ltar thams cad gzhan gyi dbang //
T04TD3878E:190a-43: de yi dbang gis de dbang med //
T04TD3878E:190a-44: de ltar shes na sbrul lta bu'i //
T04TD3878E:190a-45: dngos bo kun la khro mi bya //
T04TD3878E:190a-46: bag med pas na bdag la 'ang bdag / tsher ma la sogs gnod par byed //
T04TD3878E:190a-47: bud med la sogs thob bya'i phyir //
T04TD3878E:190a-48: rngam zhing zas gcod la sogs byed //
T04TD3878E:190a-49: gang tshe nyon mongs dbang gyur bas //
T04TD3878E:190a-50: bdag nyid kyang ni gsod byed pa //
T04TD3878E:190b-0: de tshe de dag gzhan @190b lus la ;
T04TD3878E:190b-1: / gnod mi byed par ji lta bur //
T04TD3878E:190b-2: nyon mongs skyes bas de lta bur //
T04TD3878E:190b-3: bdag gsod la sogs zhugs ba la //
T04TD3878E:190b-4: snying rje brgya la ma skyes na'ang //
T04TD3878E:190b-5: khro bar 'gyur ba ci tha tshig / de ltar bzod pas brtson 'grus brtsam //
T04TD3878E:190b-6: 'di ltar brtson la byang chub gnas //
T04TD3878E:190b-7: rlung med g-yo ba med pa bzhin //
T04TD3878E:190b-9: brtson gang dge la spro ba ste //
T04TD3878E:190b-10: de yi mi mthun phyogs bshad bya /
T04TD3878E:190b-11: le long ngan la zhen pa dang //
T04TD3878E:190b-12: sgyid lug bdag nyid brnyas pa'o //
T04TD3878E:190b-13: snyom las bde ba'i ro myong nas //
T04TD3878E:190b-14: gnyid la brten pa'i sred pa dang //
T04TD3878E:190b-15: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal mi skyo las //
T04TD3878E:190b-16: le lo nye bar skye bar 'gyur //
T04TD3878E:190b-17: de ltar mi mthun phyogs spangs te //
T04TD3878E:190b-18: sems can don bsgrub bya phyir du //
T04TD3878E:190b-19: mos brtan dga' dang dor ba dang //
T04TD3878E:190b-20: lhur len dbang sgyur stobs kyis ni //
T04TD3878E:190b-22: bdag dang gzhan gyi nyes pa ni /
T04TD3878E:190b-23: dpag med bdag gis gzhom bya ste //
T04TD3878E:190b-24: nyes pa re re tsam la yang //
T04TD3878E:190b-25: gang du bskal pa rgya mtshor zad //
T04TD3878E:190b-26: nyes zad rtsom pa de la ni //
T04TD3878E:190b-27: bdag gi cung zad tsam mi blta //
T04TD3878E:190b-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan ni //
T04TD3878E:190b-29: mang po bdag gis bsgrub bya ste //
T04TD3878E:190b-30: gang du 'ang yon tan re re zhig //
T04TD3878E:190b-31: bskal ba rgya mtshos lobs na'ang rung //
T04TD3878E:190b-32: rdo rje rgyal mtshan cho ga yis /
T04TD3878E:190b-33: brtan par brtsam zhing bsgom par bya //
T04TD3878E:190b-34: dang por 'byor ba brtags nas ni //
T04TD3878E:190b-35: brtsam mam yang na mi brtsam bya //
T04TD3878E:190b-36: ma brtsams pa ni mchog yin te //
T04TD3878E:190b-37: brtsams nas ldog par mi bya'o //
T04TD3878E:190b-39: 'di yis bya ba'i las gang yin //
T04TD3878E:190b-40: las de la ni zhen bya ste //
T04TD3878E:190b-41: las des mi ngoms dga' bar bya /
T04TD3878E:190b-42: rjes su mi bder 'gyur ba'i las //
T04TD3878E:190b-43: rig 'gyur de ma thag tu gtang //
T04TD3878E:190b-44: de ni shin tu rdzogs nas yang //
T04TD3878E:190b-45: phyi phyir byed 'dod spang bar bya //
T04TD3878E:190b-46: 'thab rnying dgra dang lhan cig tu //
T04TD3878E:190b-47: g-yul ngor ral kha lhags pa bzhin //
T04TD3878E:190b-48: nyon mongs mtshon las bzur bya zhing //
T04TD3878E:190b-49: nyon mongs dgra rnams 'joms par brtag / g-yul du ral gri lhung gyur na /
T04TD3878E:190b-50: 'jigs pas myur du len pa ltar //
T04TD3878E:190b-51: de bzhin dran pa'i mtshon shor na //
T04TD3878E:190b-52: dmyal ba'i 'jigs dran myur du blang //
T04TD3878E:190b-53: ji ltar shing bal 'gro ba dang //
T04TD3878E:191a-0: @191a * // 'ong ba rlung gi dbang gyur pa //
T04TD3878E:191a-1: de bzhin 'byor pa mos pa yis //
T04TD3878E:191a-2: dbang du gyur pas myur du 'grub //
T04TD3878E:191a-3: de ltar brtson 'grus bskyed nas ni /
T04TD3878E:191a-4: yid ni ting nge 'dzin la bzhag / sems ni rnam par g-yeng ba'i mi //
T04TD3878E:191a-5: nyon mongs mche ba'i phrag na gnas //
T04TD3878E:191a-6: lus dang sems ni dben pa yis //
T04TD3878E:191a-7: rnam par g-yeng ba mi 'byung ngo //
T04TD3878E:191a-8: de bas 'jig rten spang bya zhing //
T04TD3878E:191a-9: rnam par rtog pa'ang yongs su dor //
T04TD3878E:191a-10: chags pa'i phyir dang rnyed sogs la //
T04TD3878E:191a-11: sred bas 'jig rten mi spangs te //
T04TD3878E:191a-12: de bas 'di dag yongs spongs la //
T04TD3878E:191a-13: mkhas pas 'di dag dpyad par bya //
T04TD3878E:191a-14: bdag dang gzhan du mnyam pa ni //
T04TD3878E:191a-15: dang po nyid du 'bad de bsgom //
T04TD3878E:191a-16: bde dang sdug bsngal mnyam bas na //
T04TD3878E:191a-17: thams cad bdag bzhin bsrung bar bya //
T04TD3878E:191a-18: bdag nyid skyon bcas gzhan la yang //
T04TD3878E:191a-19: yon tan rgya mtshor shes byas nas //
T04TD3878E:191a-20: bdag 'dzin yongs su dor ba dang //
T04TD3878E:191a-21: gzhan blang par ni bsgom par bya //
T04TD3878E:191a-22: gang zhig bdag dang gzhan rnams ni //
T04TD3878E:191a-23: myur du bskyab bar 'dod pa des //
T04TD3878E:191a-24: bdag dang gzhan du brje bya ba //
T04TD3878E:191a-25: gsang ba'i dam pa spyad bar bya //
T04TD3878E:191a-26: de bas sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir //
T04TD3878E:191a-27: log pa'i lam las sems blan zhing //
T04TD3878E:191a-28: yang dag dmigs la rtag tu yang //
T04TD3878E:191a-29: yid ni brtan por gzung bar bya //
T04TD3878E:191a-30: de ltar de dag thams cad kyang //
T04TD3878E:191a-31: shes rab don du thub pas gsungs //
T04TD3878E:191a-32: de bas mya ngan 'das pa dang //
T04TD3878E:191a-33: bde ba 'dod pas shes rab bskyed //
T04TD3878E:191a-34: don dam dang ni kun rdzob ste //
T04TD3878E:191a-35: 'di ni bden pa gnyis su gnas //
T04TD3878E:191a-36: don dam blo yi spyod yul min //
T04TD3878E:191a-37: blo dang sgra ni kun rdzob yin //
T04TD3878E:191a-38: de la 'jig rten rnam gnyis mthong //
T04TD3878E:191a-39: rnal 'byor pa dang de bzhin phal //
T04TD3878E:191a-42: gong ma gong ma'i khyad par gyis //
T04TD3878E:191a-44: bdag gis byang chub spyod ba la //
T04TD3878E:191a-45: 'jug pa rnam par bsams pa yis ;
T04TD3878E:191a-46: / dge pa gang des 'gro ba kun //
T04TD3878E:191a-47: byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog //
T04TD3878E:191a-48: phyogs rnams kun na lus dang sems //
T04TD3878E:191a-49: sdug bsngal nad pa ji snyed pa //
T04TD3878E:191a-50: de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyis //
T04TD3878E:191a-51: bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par shog / de dag sangs rgyas bde thob kyi //
T04TD3878E:191b-0: rab tu bde ba nyams ma @191b gyur ;
T04TD3878E:191b-1: /'gro bas bla na med pa yi //
T04TD3878E:191b-2: bde ba rgyun mi 'chad thob shog /'jig rten khams na dmyal ba dag / gang dag ji snyed yod pa rnams //
T04TD3878E:191b-3: de dag tu ni lus can rnams //
T04TD3878E:191b-4: bde can bde bas dga' bar shog / gser gling gi bla ma chos skyong la /
T04TD3878E:191b-5: gus pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma ka ma lar kshi dang /
T04TD3878E:191b-6: d'i pam ka ras gsol ba btab nas /
T04TD3878E:191b-7: spyod pa la 'jug pa'i gtso bo'i don bcu gcig pa las phye ba sum cu rtsa drug gi don bsdus pa logs su bkod pa rdzogs so /
T04TD3878E:191b-9: // / pandi ta d'i pam ka ra dang /
T04TD3878E:191b-10: lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
